OOC: How'd he dodge it if he was blind.

BIC:  Very glad blindness tends to ruin aim Sunhawk
aimed another blast at Infernos chest and one to his
left, one to his right, one above him, and one below
him.  Then seeing another Preicon was trying to flank
him he planted a grenade (not smoke this time) where
he was likely to step on it and blow himself up.  Even
if he didn't Sunhawk could detonate it with a laser.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> Inferno quickly flew sideways to avoid the attack
> then waved his 
> flamethrower around to blow the smoke away so the
> other preds could 
> see "Your Maximal tricks will not save you"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Sunhawk could resist answering when he saw the
> > Predicon was injured.
> > 
> > Sunhawk:  TAKE YOU'RE OWN ADVICE!  BUT I HAVE
> PLANS!
> > 
> > He sent a laser beam at Inferno's chest.
> > 
> 
>
